{"rule":"CONSECUTIVE_SPACES","sentence":"^\\QHowever, having just the  \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-|Dummy-|Maniquí-|Maniquíes-)[0-9]+\\Q node and an  \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-|Dummy-|Maniquí-|Maniquíes-)[0-9]+\\Q node with target setting as a child, would not work, due to the timer returning \\E(?:Dummy|Ina|Jimmy-|Dummy-|Maniquí-|Maniquíes-)[0-9]+\\Q while waiting.\\E$"}
